issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Dependency version upgrades
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10633](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10633). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Upgrades versions to latest one. Brings in tokio 0.3, crossbeam 0.8 and some smaller updates.

comments.body:
